lead_paragraph: TURLINSKI--Charles, 69, of East Hampton, died April 13 in NYC. A private Mass was said April 19 at Our Lady of Poland R.C. Church in Southampton. A former retail executive, he is survived by his wife, Donna, children, Charlie, Jacob, Natasha, and two grandsons. Contributions in his memory can be made to the Charles Turlinski, Sr. Endowed Fellowship, at the Wharton School of Business (215-898-1612), which Chuck had established in honor of his father. 1/3
